more_views_fast_seller: Get more views and sell faster with the add-ons
top_list_ads: Feature your ad to list in the top of the search results
top_list_ads_shared: Promote your ad to go live on the biggest properties marketplace in Qatar
guaranteed_visibility: Guaranteed visibility in our new properties section
feature_ad_description: Have your Ad appear at the top of the category listings
refreshes_description: Increase ad visibility by refreshing the ad
refreshes_tooltip: Refreshes reset monthly based on the duration you select. For example, if you choose 50 refreshes for 6 months, you'll receive 50 refreshes each month for 6 months. Unused refreshes do not carry over to the next month.
combo_offer_tooltip: For example, if you choose 1 featured ad & 50 refreshes for 2 months, you'll receive 50 refreshes each month for 2 months. Unused refreshes do not carry over to the next month. And featured ad is valid for 2 months.
top_list_ads_payment: Publish your ad to go live on the biggest properties marketplace in Qatar
summary_tooltip_info: By clicking "Pay Now," you agree to post details for a single property or unit in one listing. Please note that the payment is non-refundable once the ad is published.
